author: Colin Griffiths
content: I couldn't have written this any better myself. All these choices eat a hole in my head and I keep going round and round the same internal debate as you have made. I've got some lovely Zuiko OM lenses in my drawer in perfect condition and it is criminal that I don't use them. A PEN would be a good solution. I'd just like in body stabilization AS WELL AS an in body viewfinder!
